forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 18C. Winds E at 5 to 10 km/h, becoming WNW and increasing to 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 64F. E winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming mostly sunny by afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Mostly sunny skies in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
